ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Re: hello all =)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Liz, I m new to the EQ_women group but have been using eGroups for a while. Did you perhaps send your original post from the eGroups EQ_women home page and
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Liz,

I'm new to the EQ_women group but have been using
eGroups for a while. Did you perhaps send your
original post from the eGroups EQ_women home page and
subsequent posts from your email account? This could
cause what you are describing.

I'm curious to hear if if your husband has a separate
account as well Sanna. I have had numerous friends on
EQ where husband and wife played and when they used
the same account it hasn't been a pretty sight. I've
also seen it create problems when a married couple
play on the same server and they find love interests
in the game. My husband doesn't play EQ and I prefer
it that way. I don't mean to appear pessimistic about
your playing together. I'm sure that if you have a
great relationship in RL that everything will be all
good. The best advice I could give you, take it or
leave it, is for both of you to become a team that
strive to reach common goals. If you begin to outlevel
each other I believe you might run into problems
because you'll find yourselves less able to hunt
together.

Good luck and above all else...HAVE FUN!!

Lilyana
Level 47 Paladin - Karana Server

--- Elizabeth Adams <ea9999@...> wrote:
> Hi, Sanna, nice to see you here.
>
> I assume your husband has a separate account and PC,
> or there could
> be some ugly scenes in store as the addiction
> grips....
>
> How does playing with your RL partner work? My
> boyfriend thinks I am
> a half-crazed addict, and plans to stick to the odd
> blast of Quake
> and Unreal, but I rather imagine it to be nice to
> hunt together. That
> said, there are earlier threads on the board saying
> the opposite, as
> well as supporting the idea.
>
> BTW, can anyone tell me why my very first post
> appeared under my
> name, while subsequent ones appear under my e-mail
> address?
>
> Liz, aka Gyngermynx, ranger of the 23rd season,
> Quellious
>
>
